text: Dr. Dimensionpants is a Canadian animated television series created by Brad Peyton. == Plot == Kyle Lipton was a normal 12-year-old kid, until a portal opened and dropped a pair of "The Dimensionpants", also called the 'Pants of Power' or 'Power Pants'. It is one of several powerful clothing items constructed in the Unicrone dimension, which also included socks and a summer dress. == Episodes == === Series overview === Category:2014 Canadian television series debuts Category:2015 Canadian television series endings Category:Television series
title: Dr. Dimensionpants
